redirectmanager-desc: Manage a page's redirects from within the editing form.
redirectmanager-redirect-page-invalid: The requested redirect is not a valid page title. Please enter a different title.
redirectmanager-redirect-page-exists: The requested redirect already exists. Please edit it manually.
redirectmanager-invalid-target: The requested target of this redirect ('$1') is not a valid page title.
redirectmanager-no-target: The requested target of this redirect ('$1') does not exist.
redirectmanager-edit-summary: Redirect added via the RedirectManager dialog.
tag-redirectmanager-description: Redirects added by the RedirectManager dialog.
